p: Moreover, the methanol PJ fraction has a potential antilipase effect followed by the aqueous and hexane fractions with IC 50 values of 38.9 ± 0.29, 50.11 ± 0.57, and 588 ± 0.66 μg/ml, respectively, while the commercial antiobesity drug Orlistat was used as a reference compound and has antilipase activity with an IC 50 value of 12.3 ± 0.35 μg/ml.
